data.name: DISCLAIMER
data.value: 免责声明

data.name: COUNTY WEBSITE ADVERTISING AND HOTLINK POLICY
data.value: 县网站广告和HOTLINK政策

data.name: Los Angeles County is a chartered County and a subdivision of the State of California whose mission is to provide governmental and other public services to and for the benefit of the residents of the County. In accordance with this mission, the general policy of the Board of Supervisors is to exclude from the County Internet website and the website of each County Department, all commercial advertising and promotional material, including links which provide exclusive private or financial benefit to commercial, non-public enterprises and which do not promote or enhance a public benefit to the County, its departments, or the residents served by the County. As a governmental agency, the County neither endorses nor supports individual private commercial enterprises through display of their advertising on the County’s website or through providing links to the sites of such commercial enterprises.
data.value: 洛杉矶县是特许县和加利福尼亚州的一个分区，其使命是为该县居民提供政府和其他公共服务。根据这一使命，监事会的一般政策是从县互联网网站和各县部门的网站上排除所有商业广告和宣传材料，包括为商业，非商业提供私人或经济利益的链接。 - 公共企业，不向县，其部门或县服务的居民提供或增加公益。作为一个政府机构，该县既不支持也不支持个体私营商业企业，通过在县网站上展示广告或通过提供这些商业企业网站的链接。

data.name: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Board of Supervisors recognizes that, in consideration of the nature and function of the Internet, display of commercial or promotional material or links to commercial sites may, under certain circumstances, be appropriate for inclusion in the County’s website or in departmental websites where a public purpose is served. The following guidelines are hereby adopted for the guidance of County Department Directors in determining when such materials are appropriate for inclusion in County websites.
data.value: 尽管有上述规定，监事会认识到，考虑到互联网的性质和功能，在某些情况下，商业或宣传材料的展示或商业网站的链接可能适合纳入县的网站或部门。提供公共目的的网站。特此通过以下指导原则，指导县部门主任确定何时适用于县级网站。

data.name: Advertising/Promotional Materials Where County Has Public/Financial lnterest
data.value: 广告/促销材料县有公共/金融lnterest

data.name: Public Benefit Facilities and Venues. The County has established and maintains certain facilities and venues which promote the arts, science, cultural studies, and other public purposes. Advertising and promotion of events, programs, and exhibits at such facilities and venues may be placed on the County Internet website and on departmental websites. This includes links to commercial enterprises who market tickets or other means of access to these facilities and venues or foster participation in their programs. (Examples: Ford Theater link to online ticket agency. Programs/Exhibits at Music Center, Hollywood Bowl, Art Museum, Natural History Museum)
data.value: 公益设施和场地。该县建立并维护了一些促进艺术，科学，文化研究和其他公共目的的设施和场所。在这些设施和场所举办的活动，节目和展览的广告和宣传可以放在县互联网网站和部门网站上。这包括与商业企业的链接，这些商业企业可以销售门票或其他方式进入这些设施和场所，或促进参与其计划。 （例如：福特剧院链接到在线票务代理。音乐中心的节目/展览，好莱坞碗，美术馆，自然历史博物馆）

data.name: Commercial Enterprises in which the county has a financial interest. The County possesses leasehold and other financial interests in certain commercial enterprises, and derives a financial benefit from their activities. This financial benefit to the County serves a public purpose. Accordingly, commercial advertising and other promotional materials concerning these enterprises may appear on County websites. Links to the websites of these enterprises may also be included on the County Internet website and on departmental websites at the discretion of Department Directors. Appropriate notice should be provided of the County’s financial interest in these enterprises. (Examples: Gladstone’s Restaurant, Marina Del Rey)
data.value: 该县有经济利益的商业企业。该县拥有某些商业企业的租赁权和其他经济利益，并从其活动中获得经济利益。该县的经济利益服务于公共目的。因此，有关这些企业的商业广告和其他宣传材料可能会出现在县网站上。这些企业网站的链接也可以包含在县互联网网站和部门网站上，由部门主管决定。应提供县对这些企业的经济利益的适当通知。 （例如：Gladstone餐厅，Marina Del Rey）

data.name: Where a link is provided in the County’s website and the user exits the County website and enters a commercial website, notice and a disclaimer must be displayed in accordance with Section 8 below.
data.value: 如果在县网站上提供链接并且用户退出郡网站并进入商业网站，则必须按照下面第8节的规定显示通知和免责声明。

data.name: Web-Based All-lnclusive Information about Private Enterprises which Provide a Service or Benefit to the Public where the Service or Benefit is Directly Related to a County Department’s Mission or Services
data.value: 基于网络的私营企业的全部信息，为公众提供服务或福利，其服务或福利与县部门的使命或服务直接相关

data.name: Certain commercial and public agencies maintain information about private persons, enterprises, and organizations which provide services to the public.
data.value: 某些商业和公共机构保存有关向公众提供服务的私人，企业和组织的信息。

data.name: Public Agency. Where such information is directly maintained by public agencies, such as lists of licensed child care providers or lists of restaurants that are graded by the Department of Health Services. County websites may display such information or provide links to the public agency or directly to that information.
data.value: 公共机构。这些信息由公共机构直接维护，例如获得许可的儿童保育提供者名单或由卫生服务部评定的餐馆名单。县网站可以显示此类信息或提供与公共机构的链接或直接提供给该信息。

data.name: Private Agency. Where information is maintained by private commercial agencies but the persons or organizations listed provide services directly related to the mission of a County Department or to the services it provides to the public. A Department may display such information on its website or provide a link to the information or the commercial agency which maintains such information whether or not the site linked to also contains commercial advertising. In such cases, the Department Director must make a good faith determination that:
data.value: 私人机构。如果信息由私营商业机构维护，但所列人员或组织提供与县部门的使命或其向公众提供的服务直接相关的服务。部门可以在其网站上显示此类信息，或提供信息的链接或维护此类信息的商业机构，无论该链接的网站是否也包含商业广告。在这种情况下，部门主任必须真诚地确定：

data.name: The Department’s clients, service recipients, or interested County residents would benefit from the information;
data.value: 该部门的客户，服务接受者或感兴趣的县居民将从这些信息中受益;

data.name: It would be duplicative for the Department to independently create or maintain such information; and.
data.value: 新闻部独立创建或维持此类信息将是重复的;和。

data.name: The commercial agency which maintains the information has represented that it includes all legitimate or licensed service providers within the County or within the geographical area served by the Department.
data.value: 维护信息的商业机构代表其包括县内或该部门服务的地理区域内的所有合法或许可服务提供商。

data.name: No link may be provided directly on a County departmental website to any enterprise or organization included in that information.
data.value: 县级网站上不得直接向该信息中包含的任何企业或组织提供链接。

data.name: Where a link is provided in the County website to the agency which maintains the information or to the information, and the user exits the County website and enters a commercial site which may contain advertising or other promotional material, notice and a disclaimer must be displayed in accordance with Section 8 below.
data.value: 如果县网站向维护信息或信息的机构提供了链接，并且用户退出郡网站并进入可能包含广告或其他宣传材料的商业网站，则必须显示通知和免责声明。按照下面第8节。

data.name: (Examples: A list maintained by a California State agency of licensed child care centers located in the County could be displayed on the website of a Department that serves the needs of children and families. A link to the State agency or to the list could be included even if the list maintained by the State agency contained centers both in the County and throughout the State.
data.value: （例如：由加利福尼亚州的持牌儿童保育中心机构维护的名单可以显示在一个服务于儿童和家庭需要的部门网站上。与国家机构或名单的链接可以是即使由国家机构维护的清单包括县和整个州的中心，也包括在内。

data.name: A commercially maintained list of newspapers in a particular category or geographic area could be displayed or linked to the Public Information Office website since its mission is directly related to fostering media relations. If displayed, however, no link to an individual newspaper is permitted. If a link is provided to a commercial agency maintaining the list or to the list, the site linked to may contain advertising, but a disclaimer must be displayed on the County’s website as the user exits in accordance with Section 8 below.
data.value: 商业维护的特定类别或地理区域的报纸清单可以显示或链接到新闻办公室网站，因为其使命与促进媒体关系直接相关。但是，如果显示，则不允许链接到单个报纸。如果向维护列表或列表的商业机构提供链接，则链接到的站点可能包含广告，但是当用户按照下面的第8节退出时，必须在县的网站上显示免责声明。

data.name: The Department of Health Services could display a list of public health ratings of all restaurants in the County since public dissemination of such information is directly related to its mission. However, display or linking to a commercial list of popular ratings of restaurants or to an individual restaurant would not be permitted under these guidelines.
data.value: 卫生服务部可以显示该县所有餐馆的公共卫生评级清单，因为这些信息的公开传播与其使命直接相关。但是，根据这些指南，不允许显示或链接到受欢迎的餐馆评级或个别餐厅的商业列表。

data.name: Public Works could display a list of names and locations of licensed recyclers since its mission includes fostering recycling of waste, but could not link to those businesses).
data.value: 公共工程可以显示许可回收商的名称和位置列表，因为其任务包括促进废物回收，但无法链接到这些企业）。

data.name: Links to Commercial Sites with Information Critical to or Vitally Enhancing a County Department’s Mission or Services where Replication of Information by Department is Not Feasible
data.value: 链接到商业网站的信息至关重要或真正增强县部门的使命或服务，其中部门信息复制不可行

data.name: Certain private commercial sites maintain and display information which provides a public or community service or other ancillary static or interactive information to aid the public which is not generally available through a governmental agency due to the cost of compiling, maintaining, and/or displaying such information. In order to support the cost of compilation and maintenance of this information, these private commercial sites may include advertising or promotional material in the information display.
data.value: 由于编制，维护和/或显示此类信息的成本，某些私人商业网站维护和显示提供公共或社区服务或其他辅助静态或交互信息以帮助公众的信息，这些信息通常不能通过政府机构获得。 。为了支持编辑和维护该信息的成本，这些私人商业站点可以在信息显示中包括广告或促销材料。

data.name: Although the County neither supports nor endorses entities advertised or promoted on such sites, it recognizes that a public benefit is served by providing the underlying information to assist County residents. Accordingly, links to such sites which contain this information but also display commercial advertising or promotional material may be included on departmental websites when the Department Director has made a good faith determination that:
data.value: 虽然该县既不支持也不支持在这些网站上宣传或推广的实体，但它承认通过提供基础信息来协助县居民提供公共利益。因此，当部门主任真诚地确定以下情况时，可以在部门网站上包含指向包含此类信息但也显示商业广告或宣传材料的此类网站的链接：

data.name: The department’s independent replication of the information targeted for linkage is infeasible due to financial or other considerations; and,
data.value: 由于财务或其他方面的考虑，该部门对链接目标信息的独立复制是不可行的;和，

data.name: No, non-commercial site provides the information targeted to linkage; and,
data.value: 不，非商业网站提供针对联系的信息;和，

data.name: The information targeted for linkage is critical to a service provided by the Department, or
data.value: 针对联系的信息对于部门提供的服务至关重要，或者

data.name: The information targeted for linkage is a vital enhancement to the Department’s mission. (Examples: The Chief Executive Office and Board offices could link to a private website that provides information about community activities in unincorporated areas. The Department of Parks and Recreation could link to a site that provides sports league management services.)
data.value: 针对联系的信息是该部门使命的重要增强。 （例如：行政长官办公室和董事会办公室可以链接到一个私人网站，提供有关非法人区域社区活动的信息。公园和娱乐部可以链接到提供体育联盟管理服务的网站。）

data.name: A disclaimer must be displayed on the County’s website as the user exits in accordance with Section 8 below.
data.value: 当用户按照下面第8节的规定退出时，必须在郡的网站上显示免责声明。

data.name: County Program Sponsors and Donors
data.value: 县项目赞助商和捐助者

data.name: County program sponsors and cash or services donors may be acknowledged through a display of their names, logos, or other information, but no link is permitted to their websites. The listing of such sponsors or donors is limited to secondary pages of websites, but may be accessed from the primary page. Departments are responsible for informing the Board of such donations through the current established process for donations.
data.value: 县计划赞助商和现金或服务捐赠者可以通过显示他们的姓名，徽标或其他信息来确认，但不允许链接到他们的网站。此类赞助商或捐赠者的列表仅限于网站的二级页面，但可以从主页面访问。各部门负责通过目前已建立的捐赠程序向董事会通报此类捐款。

data.name: (Examples: Public Works could list sponsors of environmental programs, but could not link to their sites. Beaches and Harbors and Parks and Recreation could name their official sponsors. Private designers of websites who have donated their services may be acknowledged, but no link is permitted to their websites).
data.value: （例如：公共工程可以列出环境计划的赞助商，但无法链接到他们的网站。海滩和港口以及公园和娱乐可以命名他们的官方赞助商。捐赠他们服务的网站的私人设计师可能会被承认，但没有链接是允许他们的网站）。

data.name: Government Agencies; Academic Institutions; Public-Private Partnerships; Professional, Cultural, Community-Based and Non-Profit Organizations
data.value: 政府机构;学术机构;公私合作伙伴关系;专业，文化，社区和非营利组织

data.name: Links to Search Engines
data.value: 搜索引擎的链接

data.name: Links to search engines are permitted where a Department’s core mission would be advanced by presenting information from a variety of sources external to the Department.
data.value: 允许通过从部门外部的各种来源提供信息来推进部门的核心任务，从而链接到搜索引擎。

data.name: No Links to Sites Containing Inappropriate Material
data.value: 没有指向包含不合适材料的网站的链接

data.name: Links to sites containing inappropriate material are expressly prohibited.
data.value: 明确禁止链接到包含不适当材料的网站。

data.name: Notice of Leaving County Website and a Disclaimer
data.value: 离开县网站的通知和免责声明

data.name: When providing links to non-County sites, Departments must include a disclaimer on their home page disavowing endorsement or responsibility for the material on sites being linked. Departments must also use a standardized alert or redirect script page that warns users they are leaving the County site and allows them to proceed or cancel. This alert would read: “You are now leaving the Los Angeles County website and linking to a website that may contain commercial advertising. Los Angeles County does not endorse or support any of the advertising that may be contained on this site.
data.value: 在提供与非郡网站的链接时，各部门必须在其主页上包含免责声明，否认对链接网站上的材料的认可或责任。部门还必须使用标准化警报或重定向脚本页面，警告用户他们离开县网站并允许他们继续或取消。此警报将显示：“您现在离开洛杉矶县网站并链接到可能包含商业广告的网站。洛杉矶县不认可或支持本网站上可能包含的任何广告。

data.name: Contractors that Create Websites for County Departments
data.value: 为县部门创建网站的承包商

data.name: Departments shall provide website contractors with a copy of this policy and website design guidelines, which contractors shall observe in creating webpages for Departments. The requirement to follow these guidelines shall be set forth in the contract for website design. The Internal Services Department, in creating webpages for Departments. shall enforce the adopted guidelines.
data.value: 各部门应向网站承包商提供本政策和网站设计指南的副本，承包商应在为部门创建网页时遵守。遵守这些准则的要求应在网站设计合同中规定。内政部为各部门创建网页。应执行通过的准则。

data.name: Authority of Chief Executive Officer
data.value: 首席执行官的权力

data.name: The CEO is authorized to order removal of material from Department websites which is noncompliant with these adopted guidelines.
data.value: 首席执行官有权下令从部门网站上删除不符合这些采用的指南的材料。

data.name: Link Maintenance
data.value: 链接维护

data.name: Departments shall routinely check links on their websites to ensure they are functional and contain no material which violates this policy.
data.value: 各部门应定期检查其网站上的链接，以确保其功能正常，并且不包含任何违反此政策的内容。

data.name: Language Translation
data.value: 语言翻译

data.name: The website has made reasonable efforts to provide an accurate translation. However, no automated or computerized translation is perfect and is not intended to replace human or traditional translation methods. The official text is the English version of this website. If any questions arise concerning the accuracy of the information presented by the translated version of the website, please refer to the English edition of the website, which is the official version.
data.value: 该网站已做出合理的努力，以提供准确的翻译。但是，没有自动化或计算机化的翻译是完美的，并不是要取代人类或传统的翻译方法。官方文本是本网站的英文版。如果对网站翻译版本所提供信息的准确性有任何疑问，请参阅网站的英文版，这是正式版。
